About Me

A few things to know about me...

Bio

An enthusiastic, passionate and curious technophile/developer. Always looking for opportunities to learn, impove, challenge myself and (above all) help others using the skills I acquire.

The Past

Summarized origin story

Born in Lagos Nigeria, grew up toying with computers since the windows '95 days, wanting to work with them for the rest of my life. studied the sciences, and graduated with a degree in computer engineering from the University of Benin, freelancing all the way.

The Present

What I'm up to these days

P.A. to Eng. Kunle Fakoya (independennt consultant to Providence Research and Livia Soft ) working as a software analyst, reviewing propreitary and open source enterprise applications and developing technical documentation. By moonlight, I do freelance webdev and practice programming almost daily.

The Future

Goals, hopes & dreams etcetera

Looking to learn, adopt, master, and build with the latest technologies ( , firebase, electron, flutter/dart etc) and Industry standards. Collaborate globally in a career with a reputable tech agency. Make enough to take care of loved ones and help the less fortunate. Settle down with the love of my life. Help the human condition. Leave a legacy.
